data.title: Tonia Marketaki
data.meta_description: Tonia Marketaki was a celebrated film director and screenwriter born on July 28, 1942, in Piraeus, Greece. She spent her childhood years in the Zografou district of Athens, and her maternal origins are from Kardamyla, in the island of Chios. Marketaki received her formal training at IDHEC in Paris, and upon her return to Greece, she worked as a film critic in various newspapers from 1963 until 196...
